constraints_details.result: Hinterland Lower Lea Valley including Stratford

description: Application for full planning permission for comprehensive mixed use redevelopment comprising: erection of three blocks (Blocks A, B and C), ranging from four (4) storeys to part six (6), part seven (7) storeys above ground level with a maximum parapet height of 29.25m AOD to provide; up to 483sqm of non-residential floorspace (Use Class A1-A5 and Class B1), with entrance lobbies, cycle store (132 no. spaces), servicing and refuse areas, plant room and 3 no. car parking spaces, including 1 no. Blue Badge parking space; 71 residential dwellings (Use Class C3) (30 x 1 bedroom; 32 x 2 bedroom; 4 x 3 bedroom; 5 x 4 bedroom), together with provision of amenity areas and associated site works including excavation and re-grading of site levels, utility diversions, upgrades and new connections and other supporting infrastructure and engineering works. This planning application is accompanied by an Environmental Statement.
